message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $110 for it. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll sell the product to you for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $130 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $128. It's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $128 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $126. It's my final offer. What do you think?
